title: Dotted font
content:
Hello

I am looking for a font that is entirely made of dots, but its not a dot-matrix font. The characters are comprised two different sizes of dots. The dots are not structurally aligned and are more randomly scattered within the letter character.

Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated!

thanks.
author: GBayly

comments.content:
Fortuna Dot would be a nice option:

[http://www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-FODO](http://web.archive.org/web/20090607101937/http:/www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-FODO "http://www.fontbros.com/cgi-bin/commerce.cgi?preadd=action&key=HAFO-FODO")
